item.title: ongoing projects
item.description: my current research consists of: Hierarchical Disjoint Principal Component Analysis (Cavicchia, C., Vichi, M. and Zaccaria, G.) Revision requested A new ranking calculation based on a composite indicator model: the case of the top 20 European football teams (Cavicchia, C. and Sarnacchiaro, P.) Revision requested Hierarchical Means Clustering (Vichi, M., Cavicchia, C. and Groenen, P.J.F.) Revision requested How much do Knowledge about and Attitude toward mobile phone use affect Behavior while driving?

item.title: publications

Spatiotemporal estimation of heavy metals Pollution in the Mediterranean Sea from Volturno River, Southern Italy: Distribution, Risk Assessment and Loads Chemistry and Ecology, (2022) Cavicchia, C., Vichi, M. and Zaccaria, G.
